title: Ticket #3497: docs should mention need to enable rhn channel on rhel5
description: A user has discovered that HTCondor depends on libvirt, which is not available in the default Red Hat Network channels for RHEL5. This channel must be explicitly enabled for the installation to work. We might want to mention this in the manual.
remarks:
2013-Mar-07 11:49:49 by matyas:
The specific channel to enable is "RHEL Virtualization"
check_ins: 2013-Mar-07 12:19   Check-in [35096]: Use correction of a typo to update links, ht-ify, and update versions for RPMs and Debian packages. Also make note that RHEL 5 needs virtualization channel explicitly enabled. ===GT=== #3497 ===GT=== #3338 (By Karen Miller )
creator: matyas
